search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for PayPal (paypal.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for PayPal can be found here: [https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/merchant-fees](https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/merchant-fees)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: PayPal Business Pricing | Transaction & Processing Fees | PayPal US

extracted_content.content:
PayPal Business Pricing | Transaction & Processing Fees | PayPal US | PayPal US
===============

    ### Resources

    *   [![Image 10: Contact Sales](https://www.paypalobjects.com/marketing/web/US/en/rebrand/pictograms/enterprise-contact.svg) Contact Sales](https://www.paypal.com/us/enterprise/contact-sales)
    *   [![Image 11: Become a Partner](https://www.paypalobjects.com/paypal-ui/pictograms/blue/svg/partner-integration-blue.svg) Become a Partner](https://www.paypal.com/us/enterprise/become-a-partner)
    
*   [Developer](https://developer.paypal.com/home/)

*   [Help](https://www.paypal.com/us/cshelp/personal)

[Log In](https://www.paypal.com/signin)[Sign Up](https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/account-selection)

PayPal pricing
==============

Pricing to fit
--------------

your business
-------------

![Image 12: Visa, MasterCard, Apple Pay, Maestro, American Express, and Discover logos on individual white squares](https://www.paypalobjects.com/marketing/web23/us/en/business/pricing/all-images/card-content-carousel-01_size-all.jpg?quality=75&width=300)

Card processing

Starting at

**2.89%**

\+ $0.29 per transaction

![Image 13: Yellow PayPal button above blue Venmo button](https://www.paypalobjects.com/marketing/web23/us/en/business/pricing/all-images/card-content-carousel-02_size-all.jpg?quality=75&width=300)

PayPal and Venmo

Starting at

**3.49%**

\+ $0.49 per transaction

![Image 14: A green mid-century modern chair next to a label reading “Leather armchair,” all above a yellow Pay Later button](https://www.paypalobjects.com/marketing/web23/us/en/business/pricing/all-images/card-content-carousel-03_size-all.jpg?quality=75&width=300)

Pay Later

Starting at

**4.99%**

\+ $0.49 per transaction

![Image 15: White PayPal card reader](https://www.paypalobjects.com/marketing/web23/us/en/business/pricing/all-images/card-content-carousel-04_size-all.jpg?quality=75&width=300)

Point of Sale

Starting at

**2.29%**

\+ $0.09 per transaction

*   [Online](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/pricing#online)
*   [In Person](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/pricing#In%20Person)
*   [Other](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/pricing#Other)

Accept payments online, easily and securely
-------------------------------------------

Offer PayPal payments, process cards, or do both.

[Sign Up](https://www.paypal.com/us/bizsignup/entry?product=ppcp)

### PayPal payments

Mix and match from our popular payment options.

PayPal

**3.49%**

\+ $0.49 per transaction

PayPal can help complete an average of 46% more checkout conversions.1

Venmo

**3.49%**

\+ $0.49 per transaction

Engage 92 million consumers who have active Venmo accounts.2

Pay Later

**4.99%**

\+ $0.49 per transaction

62% of PayPal shoppers say paying with PayPal Pay Later makes them more likely to purchase.3

### Credit and debit cards

Choose the right checkout solution for your business.

#### PayPal Checkout

Let your customers choose their favorite payment options. Seller Protection can help your business avoid chargebacks, reversals, and fees on eligible transactions.4 [Learn more](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/accept-payments/checkout/integration#paypal-checkout)

**Credit and debit cards**

**2.99%**

\+ $0.49 per transaction

#### Expanded Checkout

Your customers can pay with cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and more. Tailor your approach to risk management and your checkout experience. [Learn more](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/accept-payments/checkout/integration#expanded-checkout)

**Credit and debit cards**

**2.89%**

\+ $0.29 per transaction

Simplify in-person sales
------------------------

Start selling right away with the PayPal POS app. Purchase optional equipment any time.

[Sign Up](https://www.paypal.com/cponboarding/entry?country.x=US)[Learn More](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/pos-system)

Card present

**2.29%**

\+ $0.09 per transaction

Card keyed in

**3.49%**

\+ $0.09 per transaction

QR code

**2.29%**

\+ $0.09 per transaction

##### Card Reader

$29 for your first card reader

\+ transaction fees

[Learn more](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/pos-system/card-reader)

[Shop for Card Reader](https://shop.zettle.com/us/card-terminals/zettle-reader-2)

##### Terminal

$199 for terminal only

\+ transaction fees

[Learn more](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/pos-system/terminal)

[Shop for Terminal](https://shop.zettle.com/us/zettle-terminal)

##### Tap to Pay

Included with the POS app

\+ transaction fees

[Learn more](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/pos-system/tap-to-pay)

[Get the App](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/pos-system/software)

More ways to
------------

accept payments
---------------

### Invoicing

Send an online invoice that customers can pay instantly using their preferred payment method, even if they don’t have an account with PayPal. [Learn more](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/accept-payments/invoice)

PayPal and Venmo

**3.49%**

\+ $0.49 per transaction

Pay Later

**4.99%**

\+ $0.49 per transaction

Cards and Apple Pay

**2.99%**

\+ $0.49 per transaction

### Virtual Terminal

Manually enter card payments via your web browser. [Learn more](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/accept-payments/virtual-terminal)

**3.39%**

\+ $0.29 per transaction

+$30 monthly fee

Unique pricing models for unique businesses
-------------------------------------------

### Charity and donations pricing

Get competitive low rates to receive donations. Registered charities pay reduced transaction fees with PayPal.

[Learn More](https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/nfp)

### Pricing for high-volume merchants

Custom rates and interchange plus pricing are available for established businesses that process a large volume of payments annually.

[Contact Sales](https://www.paypal.com/us/enterprise/contact-sales)

### Explore pricing for all products

[Learn More](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/paypal-business-fees)

Why businesses
--------------

choose PayPal
-------------

### Security

*   End-to-end encryption on all transactions
    
*   Seller Protection on eligible transactions4
    
*   24/7 transaction fraud analysis and order decisioning5
    

### Global reach

*   Trusted by over 400+ million active accounts worldwide
    
*   Available in 200+ markets and 140 currencies
    

### Tools for growth

*   Reporting and customer insights dashboards
    
*   Shipping and logistics tracking
    
*   Promotional offer tools
    
*   Business loans, credit card, and debit card
    

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

### Why do the card processing prices differ between PayPal Checkout and Expanded Checkout?

With [PayPal Checkout](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/accept-payments/checkout/integration#paypal-checkout), we’ll handle unauthorized transactions and chargebacks, as well as [compliance reporting](https://www.paypal.com/us/brc/article/pci-dss-compliance-basics). In short, you pay a little more for PayPal to manage your checkout experience.

With [Expanded Checkout](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/accept-payments/checkout/integration#expanded-checkout), you can accept more payment options. Have more control over customization. Tailor your approach to risk management. And access advanced fraud management tools. Since you're managing checkout, you pay a lower fee. And you'll handle refunds, chargebacks for unauthorized transactions, and compliance reporting.

We support businesses
---------------------

just like yours
---------------

Every business needs a reliable partner. From secure payment processing to helpful business insights, we’re here for you.

[Sign Up](https://www.paypal.com/us/bizsignup/entry?product=ppcp)[Contact Sales](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/contact-sales)

[PayPal Logo](https://www.paypal.com/us/home)

*   [Help](https://www.paypal.com/us/cshelp/personal)
*   [Contact](https://www.paypal.com/us/smarthelp/contact-us)
*   [Fees](https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/paypal-fees)
*   [Security Center](https://www.paypal.com/us/security)
*   [Privacy Center](https://www.paypal.com/us/privacy-center/home)
*   [Shop](https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/shopping-selection)
*   [Apps](https://www.paypal.com/us/digital-wallet/mobile-apps)
*   [Enterprise](https://www.paypal.com/us/enterprise)
*   [Partners](https://www.paypal.com/us/enterprise/industry-solutions/platforms-and-marketplaces)

*   [See all countries/regions](https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/country-worldwide)

* * *

*   [About](https://about.pypl.com/about-us/default.aspx)
*   [Newsroom](https://newsroom.paypal-corp.com/)
*   [Jobs](https://careers.pypl.com/home/)
*   [Investor Relations](https://investor.pypl.com/home/default.aspx)
*   [Government Relations](https://about.pypl.com/how-we-work/issues-and-advocacy/default.aspx)

* * *

*   © 1999–2025
*   [Accessibility](https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/accessibility)
*   [Privacy Statement](https://www.paypal.com/us/legalhub/privacy-full)
*   [Cookies](https://www.paypal.com/myaccount/privacy/cookiePrefs)
*   [Legal](https://www.paypal.com/us/legalhub/home)

PayPal is located at 2211 N 1st St. San Jose, CA 95131

1

Nielsen, commissioned by PayPal, Nielsen Behavioral Panel of USA with 2,000 monthly average desktop purchase transactions with small- and medium-sized merchants, from 13,000 consumers from April 2022 – March 2023. Checkout conversion percentage is measured from the point at which the customer starts to pay on websites that accept PayPal.

2

Based on PayPal internal data as of April 2024. 92 million active consumers represents unique consumers in the Venmo Wallet network that Fastlane intends to recognize. Participation in the Fastlane consumer network requires consent. Venmo is currently only available to US consumers.

3

Nielsen, commissioned by PayPal, Nielsen Attitudinal Survey of USA (June 2023) with 2,001 recent purchasers (past 4 weeks) from small- and medium-sized merchants, including 643 PayPal transactions without Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) and 357 PayPal transactions with BNPL. PayPal Pay Later includes Pay Monthly and Pay In 4. PayPal without BNPL includes “pay full amount at time of purchase” and “credit” purchases.

4

Available for eligible transactions. [Limits apply](https://www.paypal.com/legalhub/paypal/useragreement-full).

5

[Learn more about 24/7 transaction fraud](https://www.paypal.com/us/business/operations/risk-management).

  

If you accept cookies, we’ll use them to improve and customize your experience and enable our partners to show you personalized PayPal ads when you visit other sites. [Manage cookies and learn more](https://www.paypal.com/myaccount/privacy/cookiePrefs?locale=en_US)

Accept

Decline

Explore PayPal Business for online payments. Understand transaction and processing fees while discovering flexible pricing for your payment solutions.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: PayPal offers usage-based pricing for transactions with varying rates depending on the payment method and context.

features: Visa, MasterCard, Apple Pay, Maestro, American Express, Discover

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Processing fees for PayPal and Venmo transactions.
Processing fees for Pay Later transactions.

additional_fees.fee_description: Monthly fee for using the Virtual Terminal service.
